name: Beanie Babies A-Z Quiz Series - F  | 10 Questions

questions.text: Which one of these is a dog?
questions.explanation:
Frisbee.

	Frisbee is a smokey colored dog.  He has teal colored eyes, which match his bow beautifully.  His bow is a black and teal plaid design. "Throw the disc and watch me goI'll always bring it back, you knowTo me this game is always newYou'll get tired before I do!"

questions.text: Which of these is a white dog?
questions.explanation:
Farley.

	Farley is a white dog with very fluffy feet, tail, and face.  He also wears a plaid collar. "Over bonnie hill and daleI'll run and romp and wag my tailOutdoors is where I long to beC'mon with me and we'll run free!"

questions.text: Which of these is a gray dog?
questions.explanation:
Fizzer.

	Both Farley and Fireworks are white dogs.  Fitz is an Irish Setter, so he is a rich reddish brown color.  Fizzer is a gray dog with dark brown spots around his eyes. "Let's run! Let's jump! Let's play around!Let's howl! Let's bark! Let's dig the ground!Let's fetch! Let's catch! C'mon hurry!Can't help I've got such ENERGY!"

questions.text: Which of these is a lamb?
questions.explanation:
Fleece.

	Fleece is another flat Beanie Baby, which means she lies on her stomach.  She has a white fleece, and a cream colored face. "Fleece would like to sing a lullabyBut please be patient, she's rather shyWhen you sleep, keep her by your earHer song will leave you nothing to fear."

questions.text: Which of these is a pink cat?
questions.explanation:
Fleur.

	Fleur is a French cat, so she is very fancy.  She has a pink bow. "I love to smell the pretty flowersWhen they bloom after spring showersGuess that's how I got my name'Cause Fleur and flower are the same!"

questions.text: Which of these is an all white cat?
questions.explanation:
Flip.

	Flip is all white, except for parts of her face.  Her eyes are blue, with black centers.  The inside of her ears, her nose, and her whiskers are all pink. "Flip the cat is an acrobatShe loves playing on her matThis cat flips with such grace and flairShe can somersault in mid air!"

questions.text: Which of these Beanie Babies loves trees?
questions.explanation:
Flora.

	Flora is a green bear with a bubbly green bow.  She loves trees and all things green.  This is because flora is Latin for flower. "I love the green leaves on the treesWhen flowers bloom and buzzing beesThere's so much beauty you can seeCome take a nature walk with me!"

questions.text: Which of these is NOT a Beanie Baby butterfly?
questions.explanation:
Flight.

	Flitter is mainly blue and pink.  Flutter is mainly orange and red.  Float is mainly green and blue.  Flitter and Flutter have the same poem. Flitter/Flutter: "I did not know what I was to beCovered in fuzz, it was hard to seeNow a butterfly, what a beautiful sightOn silken wings I take to flight!" Float: "She flitters and flies and floats aroundGraceful and lovely, not making a soundAlthough she flies both near and farShe'll always return to where you are!"

questions.text: Which of these is a panda bear?
questions.explanation:
Fortune.

	Fortune sits like a regular bear, except he is a panda bear!  He wears a red bow. "Nibbling on a bamboo treeThis little panda is hard to seeYou're so lucky with this one you foundOnly a few are still around!"

questions.text: Which of these is a big cat, like a tiger?
questions.explanation:
Freckles.

	Freckles is a leopard.  The other three are regular cats. "From the trees he hunts preyIn the night and in the dayHe's the king of camouflageLook real close, he's no mirage!"
